name: Lights Escape
description:
Description

Lights Escape is a classic platformer with one twist. When you move the lights in the level will fade out. Survive the death traps and find your way out quickly! Else you will become lost in complete darkness. At least there is someone willing to help you.

Made with:

Godot Engine 2.1

Krita 3.1

Bfxr

Soundation

Controls Keyboard

WASD/Arrow keys: Movement

Space: Jump

Shift + Jump + Running: Long Jump

R: Restart level

Escape: Back to main menu

Controllers are supported (Xbox controller layout used in example)!

Controller

Left Stick: Movement

A button: Jump

Right trigger + running + jump: Long Jump

Y button: Restart Level

B button: Back to main menu!
